c74object.name: bach.bitdecode
c74object.description: Tells which bits are on in a given integer.

inlet.digest: The number whose bits must be decoded

outlet.description: The output list contains the 0-based indices of the bits which are on in the incoming integer.

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the active bits of the most recently received input number.

method.name: int
method.description: For each incoming number, the list of 0-based indices of the bits which are on (if any) is collected and output through the outlet. For instance, the number 9 will trigger the output of 0 3, since the first and fourth bits are on. Notice that when the 0 number is input, nothing happens. Also, incidentally, -1 will trigger the output of all 32 or 64 bits (depending if Max is running in 32- or 64-bit mode).

entry.name: Inlet 1 (int)
entry.description: The number whose bits must be decoded.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (list)
entry.description: Indices of active bits. The output list contains the 0-based indices of the bits which are on in the incoming integer.
